keep.description: comma-separated list of profile node permissions that need to be kept. Default: layoutAssignments,loginHours,loginIpRanges,custom,userLicense

path.name: path
path.description: comma-separated list of profiles, or path to profiles folder. Default: default package directory

texei:user:update.description: updates the current user of a scratch org
examples:
sfdx texei:user:update --targetusername myOrg@example.com --values "LanguageLocaleKey='fr'" 
Successfully updated record: 005D2A90N8A11SVPE2.

texei:contractstatus:value:add.description: add a value to Contract Status picklist
examples: sfdx texei:contractstatus:value:add --label 'My New Contract Status Label' --apiname 'My New Contract Status API Name' --targetusername texei

label.name: label
label.description: label of the Contract Status value to add

apiname.name: apiname
apiname.description: API Name of the Contract Status value to add

statuscategory.name: statuscategory
statuscategory.description: Status Category of the Contract Status value to add

texei:package:dependencies:install.description: install dependent Packages for a sfdx project

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

installationkeys.name: installationkeys
installationkeys.description: installation key for key-protected packages (format is 1:MyPackage1Key 2: 3:MyPackage3Key... to allow some packages without installation key)

packages.name: packages
packages.description: comma-separated list of the packages to install related dependencies

securitytype.name: securitytype
securitytype.description: security access type for the installed package (see force:package:install for default value)

wait.name: wait
wait.description: number of minutes to wait for installation status (also used for publishwait). Default is 10

noprompt.name: noprompt
noprompt.description: allow Remote Site Settings and Content Security Policy websites to send or receive data without confirmation

apexcompile.name: apexcompile
apexcompile.description: compile all Apex in the org and package, or only Apex in the package (see force:package:install for default value)
